channel.title: Recover password
channel.description:
Hello!
I tried recovering my password at the moparisthebest forum but haven't receive any mail.
As I have had many email addresses over the past few years, I'm not sure whether I'm checking the right one. I tried through the email on my moparscape profile page: snowguns4@gmail.com.
My moparscape username is 'Snow_' ( https://www.moparscape.org/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=638748).
The password recovery also doesn't seem to work for an older account of mine (registered in 2008, username: catthoor, email: jaspercatthoor@gmail.com).
Thanks for your time!
Jasper Catthoor

item.title: Recover password
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It looks like your username is Snow3 and you have the correct email set, try again?

Read full topic

item.title: Recover password
item.dc:creator: @lurtz1230 lurtz1230
item.description:
@lurtz1230 wrote:

I was able to finally receive the recovery email, I have my account back now =)

Read full topic
